channel.title: Mi Note 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

image.title: Mi Note 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.QFNMIXM Fastboot update for Mi Note 10 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Note 10 Lite Global

Codename: toco

Version: V12.0.3.0.QFNMIXM | 10.0

Size: 4.0 GB

MD5: 4cd6ff1f1be777fdcdcb8c29c5badc60

Changelog:
[Control center]
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
